### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=107.5, y=-33.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Water supply system at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=107.5, y=-33.5)
- Pipe group (fluid system 122591, position x=107.5, y=-34.5)

### Steam supply system at position(x=117.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of following entities
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Pipe group (fluid system 122595, position x=117.5, y=-34.5)

### Transport system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
- Belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.
- Check the entity's status and warnings to identify any issues that may be preventing the insertion.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure the offshore pump is properly connected to a pipe group to function correctly.

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure the boiler has a sufficient fuel supply to function correctly.
- Check the boiler's status and warnings to identify any issues that may be preventing it from working.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure the steam engine is properly connected to a pipe group and has a sufficient steam supply to function correctly.
- Check the steam engine's status and warnings to identify any issues that may be preventing it from working.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables have been defined or assigned in the provided execution logs.
